resources.string: Select visa in the tab that opens and close the window when you complete the transaction
You will receive a bill prompt soon

Dial *170# and choose option 6: Wallet followed by option 3: My Approvals to confirm payment. If payment is confirmed successfully click CONFIRM to complete. NB: Wait for confirmation message before you tap CONFIRM. Cancel if you wish to terminate transaction
You have successfully purchased %s for Â¢ %.2f
